name: linear-cursor-sprint-toolkit
description: A Cursor AI-powered toolkit for engineering team leads using Linear

scripts.issues:all: dotenvx run -- $HOME/.cargo/bin/linear issue list -A -s backlog -s unstarted -s started
scripts.issues:active: dotenvx run -- $HOME/.cargo/bin/linear issue list -A -s unstarted -s started
scripts.sprint: dotenvx run -- $HOME/.cargo/bin/linear issue list -A -s unstarted -s started
scripts.ready-to-deploy: dotenvx run -- $HOME/.cargo/bin/linear issue list -A --all-states --limit 500 | grep 'Ready for Deploy'
